trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.CodeDom.Compiler.CompilerError"></xref> that is obtained during the workflow compilation process.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerError"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerError"></xref> class.
Initializes the instance to define the source file name and <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref>.
A string that contains the name of the source file that has the error.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializationException"></xref> to associate with this instance.
exception is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Compiler.WorkflowCompilerError"></xref> class.
Includes initialization for several properties which define the error.
A string containing the name of the source file that has the error.
An integer representing the line number of the error.
An integer representing the column position of the start of the error.
A string that contains the error number.
A string that contains text which describes the error.
Returns the property associated with the compiler error.
The value that is returned by this property is used to map and navigate to the property that caused the compilation failure.
The property associated with the compiler error.
Provides a string which represents this instance.
A string which represents this instance/
Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> which can be accessed to read and write user-defined data associated with this instance.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> which can be accessed to read and write user-defined data associated with this instance.
